skill.name: alphafold-database
skill.description: Access AlphaFold's 200M+ AI-predicted protein structures. Retrieve structures by UniProt ID, download PDB/mmCIF files, analyze confidence metrics (pLDDT, PAE), for drug discovery and structural biology.
skill.summary: Access AlphaFold's 200M+ AI-predicted protein structures. Retrieve structures by UniProt ID, downloa...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill is documentation-only and provides examples for public AlphaFold, UniProt, and Google Cloud endpoints. It includes network requests and external command examples for data downloads, but no credential access or stealth behavior.

content.user_title: Explore AlphaFold structures by UniProt ID
content.value_statement: Finding reliable protein structures and confidence data across sources is slow. This skill provides clear steps for querying AlphaFold, downloading files, and interpreting confidence metrics.
actual_capabilities: Explain how to query AlphaFold prediction metadata by UniProt accession
Provide file URL patterns for mmCIF, PDB, confidence, and PAE files
Show UniProt uploadlists usage to resolve accessions
Document bulk download workflows with Google Cloud Storage and gsutil
Describe BigQuery metadata fields and example SQL queries
limitations: Requires internet access to AlphaFold, UniProt, and Google Cloud endpoints
Examples assume Python tools such as requests and Biopython
Does not execute downloads or analysis by itself
Large datasets may be slow or costly to retrieve

use_cases.title: Check model confidence
use_cases.description: Retrieve pLDDT and PAE guidance to judge which regions are reliable for analysis.

use_cases.title: Download target models
use_cases.description: Learn how to fetch AlphaFold structures in mmCIF or PDB for docking and pocket review.

use_cases.title: Scale to proteomes
use_cases.description: Use Google Cloud and BigQuery guidance to gather many predictions for large studies.

prompt_templates.title: Find an entry
prompt_templates.scenario: I have a UniProt ID and need metadata
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide steps to query AlphaFold for UniProt P00520 and list the entryId and file URLs.

prompt_templates.title: Download files
prompt_templates.scenario: I need structure and confidence data
prompt_templates.prompt: Show how to download the mmCIF and confidence JSON for AF-P00520-F1 with public URLs.

prompt_templates.title: Interpret metrics
prompt_templates.scenario: I want guidance on pLDDT and PAE
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to interpret pLDDT and PAE for AF-P00520-F1 and how to flag low confidence regions.

prompt_templates.title: Bulk query
prompt_templates.scenario: I need a BigQuery filter for humans
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a BigQuery query to list human proteins with fractionPlddtVeryHigh above 0.8.

output: Most residues show high pLDDT, indicating a reliable core structure
Low confidence segments appear near flexible termini
PAE suggests stable domain positions with a few uncertain interfaces

best_practices: Cache downloaded files locally to reduce repeated API calls
Review pLDDT and PAE before drawing structural conclusions
Use Google Cloud for bulk downloads instead of many REST calls
anti_patterns: Assuming all predicted regions are reliable without pLDDT review
Downloading full proteomes over REST instead of Google Cloud
Ignoring AlphaFold version suffixes in file URLs

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code
faq.answer: Yes. The guidance and API patterns apply to Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows.

faq.question: What are the main limits of AlphaFold predictions
faq.answer: Models are single chain, may miss ligands, and low confidence regions should be treated as uncertain.

faq.question: How does it integrate with existing pipelines
faq.answer: It uses REST endpoints, BioPython parsing, and BigQuery queries common in bioinformatics pipelines.

faq.question: Does it access or store private data
faq.answer: No. It references public AlphaFold and Google Cloud datasets and does not request local credentials.

faq.question: What if the API returns 404 or 429
faq.answer: Verify the UniProt ID, then retry with backoff or use bulk datasets for large jobs.

faq.question: How does this compare to website downloads
faq.answer: It enables automated retrieval, confidence analysis, and bulk access not available in the web UI.
